searchFirstUp

public static UIComponent searchFirstUp(UIComponent bottom,
                                        UISearch.UISearchFilter filter)
Applies a UISearch.UISearchFilter to the bottom component and up to all parents until the root component, the filter returns false from UISearch.UISearchFilter.canContinueSearch(UIComponent) or a match is found.

Parameters:
bottom - the start component.
filter - the filter to apply
Returns:
the found component that matches the filter
